The '''code builder''' is a UI that can be accessed via pressing the {{key|C}} key on computer devices or the third icon resembling the [[agent]] at the top-middle area on mobile devices.

== Usage ==
{{see also|Minecraft MakeCode}}
The code builder is used to program the [[agent]] and other in-game events using one of two editors:

=== MakeCode editor ===
{{Quote|Microsoft MakeCode lets you code Minecraft in Blocks, Python or JavaScript!|author=Code editor selection screen|topic=Minecraft: Education Edition|image=MakeCode icon.png|3=|4=}}

=== Notebook editor  ===
{{Quote|Learn to code in Python! Use a notebook interface to explore computer science lessons, tutorials and challenges.|author=Code editor selection screen|topic=Minecraft: Education Edition}}
